snippet: The Oscar-nominated makeup artist who created the subtle effects for "Albert Nobbs" also works on gorefests like "CSI."
abstract: The Oscar-nominated makeup artist who created the subtle effects for "Albert Nobbs" also works on gorefests like "CSI."
lead_paragraph: Matthew Mungle is an award-winning makeup artist who specializes in aging and gore -- but you might not know that from his subtle, Oscar-nominated work on "Albert Nobbs." In this video, Mr. Mungle gives the Bagger a tour of his studios in North Hollywood, replete with goo and innards, and reveals some of the behind-the-scenes tricks in turning Glenn Close into Albert, and making various body parts come to life.

headline.main: The Art of Goo and Innards
